title: The Spring Beach
detail_text: <:th_ch0006/>Hnnn~, it feels so nice~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Doesn’t it? It’s the best time of the year to go for a walk~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Absolutely. I thought the ocean would be colder, but I guess not.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>The water is just warm enough at the edge of the beach.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah. When do you reckon we can start swimming?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Probably around July.... Do you want to swim now, Maki-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh? It’s not like that, but.... I thought it would be fun to go swimming with everyone here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Oooh, that’s a good idea~! The Tokyo folks should come here! You guys are also welcome to stay the night♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Fufu, I’ll ask them then when I get back.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Aaah~, I can’t wait.... Hey, let’s play in the water for a bit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Take this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Kyaaah!? Wa-, it’s cold, geez! It’s payback time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ahahaha! Here’s one in return~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
